group_1.textLeft: [chara:301602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]We did it! Summit reached!

group_1.textRight: We managed to regain our lead.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I'm so happy!
...But there's still one quiz question left@to answer.

group_1.textRight: You took notes on all the questions, didn't@you? Show them to me again.

group_1.textLeft: Kay.

group_1.textRight: It doesn't look like anyone cleared all the@quizzes yet... No one's at the goal.
We still have time to work out the answer.

group_1.textLeft: Good point! Let's think it over one more@time!
Hrrrmmm!
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Aurgh! I can't figure it out!

group_1.textRight: ...Mm. I can't think of anything either.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* [chara:301602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301602:cheek_0][chara:301602:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301602:lipSynch_1]Let's take a breather.
We got all the way up to the peak...
But we're so obsessed with the quiz, we@haven't taken a look at the scenery.

group_1.textRight: You're right.
We should take a break. It might help to@clear our heads.

group_1.textLeft: Eyyyaahh... *Sigh*
Whoa! Check it out! You can see@everything from up here!

group_1.textRight: Yes, you really can...

group_1.textLeft: What a beautiful view!

group_1.textRight: ...?!@[wait:0.8][chara:302902:lipSynch_1]You're...

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: You're crying...

group_1.textLeft: What? Oh, I guess I am...
Haha...I wonder why?
It's just...lots of memories came rushing@back out of nowhere...

group_1.textRight: Look, Kokoro! What a gorgeous view!

group_1.textLeft: Kokoro! Want a piggyback ride?

group_1.textRight: (For this to happen now...)
I'm sorry someone like me is sitting next to@you right now.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
No, no, don't get me wrong. I'm crying@because I'm really happy.
I'm so happy to be here with you, looking@out at this pretty view...
Ever since my mom left...
I've only ever hiked up a mountain on@my own.

group_1.textRight: You don't have to hide what you're feeling.

group_1.textLeft: Oh.
I'm going to be true to[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:lipSynch_1] myself.
I've decided that I'm going to live for@myself!

group_1.narration: That day, you decided you were going to@live for yourself...

group_1.textRight: You don't have to pretend you're okay.
You don't have to force a smile when you@want to cry.
You wanted to come here with your family.@It's okay to admit that now.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:301602:cheek_0][chara:301602:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301602:lipSynch_1]Right.
I'm glad that I didn't hold back.

group_1.textRight: What?
Ahh...so that's what it meant...@Dumb question...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301602:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yaaay! I finally got one before Masara!
*Chomp* *Munch*@How is it? Too much salt?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?! [wait:0.8][chara:302902:cheek_0][chara:302902:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:302902:lipSynch_1]It's delicious...

group_1.textLeft: Really?!
Check it out! You can see everything from@up here!

group_1.textRight: Yes, you really can...

group_1.textLeft: When I look over...and see you...
When I think about how we ate lunch@together and how good it was...
And now, being able to take in this@gorgeous scenery together...
I'm so glad that I didn't hide anything.@I was able to be honest...
...and tell you that I wanted to go with you.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.5][chara:302902:lipSynch_1]Just like I thought.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: (Like I thought... Being around you is@tiring.)

group_1.narration: Unfamiliar emotions bubble up and@burst inside me when I'm around you.@I don't know how to handle it,@and it wears me out.
But looking at this view today...@It makes me feel like there might be@something great waiting beyond this feeling.
